org.jclouds.abiquo.features

Interface AdminApi


  • public interface AdminApi
    Provides synchronous access to Abiquo Admin API.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat
    See Also:
    http://community.abiquo.com/display/ABI20/API+Reference, AdminAsyncApi
